rows.label: qev090903_MSG0001
rows.name: Nnngh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0002
rows.name: Hello? What's wrong?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0003
rows.name: Are you BLADEs too?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0004
rows.name: We are. We're here hunting down the brood's queen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0005
rows.name: Me too, although I think I screwed up big time...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0006
rows.name: My leg is shot. I can't walk at ALL.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0007
rows.name:
Oh, but don't mind me!
You big lunks go on and take care of the target.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0008
rows.name:
Otherwise it'll have more kids,
and then things will REALLLY get out of hand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0009
rows.name:
Seriously! The mission is way more
important than little old me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0010
rows.name: It's true. This creature multiplies with alarming speed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0011
rows.name:
If we stop to bring this person back to New LA,
the damage will only spread.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0012
rows.name: It's difficult, but... No. The mission must come first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev090903_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask H.B. how he can abandon a fellow BLADE.

rows.label: qev090903_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev090903_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask why H.B. is so eager to finish this mission.

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0013
rows.name: You sound just like Commander Vandham.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0014
rows.name:
Shame. I thought you were capable
of more rational thought than that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_JNK0030
rows.name: Judge

rows.label: qev090903_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that Vandham is right.

rows.label: qev090903_JNK0040
rows.name: Yell

rows.label: qev090903_SEL0041
rows.name: Start chewing out H.B.

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0015
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0016
rows.name: I know, all right! I know. But I can't admit it, or else I...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0019
rows.name: Do you know what that Vandham said to me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0020
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0022
rows.name: Er, yes. The commander chewed me out similarly...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0023
rows.name:
He told me the more of us that are alive,
the more we can accomplish.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0024
rows.name: "There ain't no low-priority lives," he said.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0027
rows.name:
How can you ask that?
I just want to keep everyone in New LA safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0028
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_JNK0050
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev090903_SEL0051
rows.name:
Ask whether H.B. honestly believes
he is trying to help others.

rows.label: qev090903_JNK0060
rows.name: Accuse

rows.label: qev090903_SEL0061
rows.name: Tell H.B. that he only cares about his own pride.

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0029
rows.name: What? Yes, they're... I mean, it's our job to keep them...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0030
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0031
rows.name: ...No.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0033
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0034
rows.name:
...An old friend over in HQ came by recently
and told me I've been getting soft.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0035
rows.name:
He said that if I kept it up, I wouldn't even be able to
maintain my current position, let alone rise in the ranks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0036
rows.name:
"Use people more efficiently and carry out
your missions like a professional," he said.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0037
rows.name:
"And don't worry if someone dies—
they'll all be revived eventually."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0039
rows.name: But you saw right through me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0040
rows.name: No wonder Commander Vandham decided to chew me out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0040_02
rows.name: Did I tell you what he said?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0041_02
rows.name: The answer is clear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0042
rows.name: We'll bring this one back to the city for treatment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0043
rows.name:
If our target spawns more minions in that time,
we'll deal with it later.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0045_02
rows.name: Well, boo. You're no fun.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0045_03
rows.name: You're lucky you've got a partner with a level head, H.B.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0045_04
rows.name: You should be thankful you got set straight![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0047
rows.name: ...What?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0048
rows.name:
I was waiting for you, silly!
The commander sent me here personally.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0049
rows.name:
If you abandoned me,
I had orders to punch you right in your fat face.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0050
rows.name: Wait... But your leg...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0051
rows.name:
I told Vandham the fake broken-leg bit
was simply too cliché for words, but he insisted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0052
rows.name: He must really like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0052_02
rows.name:
Honestly, I just signed on for the chance
to deck a pretty boy right in the kisser.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0053
rows.name: Oh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0054
rows.name: Well, good luck with your mission or whatever![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0055
rows.name: I'm heading back to New LA. Ta-taaaa![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0057
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0058
rows.name:
I understand the commander's frustrations,
but did I really deserve this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_JNK0070
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev090903_SEL0071
rows.name: Agree with H.B. that Vandham doesn't like him.

rows.label: qev090903_JNK0080
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev090903_SEL0081
rows.name: Tell H.B. that Vandham loves him.

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0059
rows.name:
It's always been my plan to take his job
as BLADE commander.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0060
rows.name: I'm prepared for a little hate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0061
rows.name: I can't even process that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0062
rows.name:
If this IS Vandham's way of showing affection,
he's a twisted soul.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090903_MSG0063
rows.name: In any case, we have a job to finish. Let's go.[ST:wait ]
